definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: spoiling, robbery; spoil, booty—´[[בּ]] abs. Nu 14:3 +; so also Ez Eze 25:7 Qr (Kt [[בג]] meaningless); [[בַָּז]] Je 2:14 +; but [[הַêָבּז]] Nu 31:32 v. d. H; sf. [[בִּזׇּהּ]] Ex 29:19; —
spoiling, robbery, ´[[לְב]] i.e. to be plundered, despoiled Ez Eze 7:21 (of temple ‖[[שָׁלָל]]) Eze 23:46.

spoil, booty, plunder Is 10:6, Is 33:23, Ez Eze 29:19, Eze 38:12, Eze 38:13 (all acc. cogn. ‖[[שָׁלָל]]); cf. Nu 31:32, Je 15:13, Je 17:3; in phr. [[הָיׇה לָבַז]] Je 49:32 (of camels) Ez Eze 36:4 cf. v:Eze 36:5; also of human beings Nu 14:3, Nu 14:31, De 1:39, Je 2:14 (all ´[[היה לב]]) + 2Ki 21:14 (‖[[מְשִׁסָּה]]) Is 42:22 (‖ id.) Je 2:14, cf. Je 30:16 (‖[[מְשִׁסָּה]]); also Ez Eze 25:7 Qr, Eze 26:5 (´[[היה לב]]; both in personif.); fig. of Isr. as sheep Ez Eze 34:8, Eze 34:22 (both ´[[היה לב]]) v:Eze 34:28 [[היה בז]] (no [[לְ]]). On Is 8:1, Is 8:3 [[מַהֵר שָׁלָל חָשׁ בַּז]] v. [[מהר]].
